title: (x) Assisted Housing fonts - Friz Quadrata, Univers {Alexey, Patricia}
content:
hi all!!

I have 3 fonts I need help with.  
Here is a sample.

Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Assisted.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021232343/http:/typophile.com/files/Assisted.jpg) | 90.75 KB |
author: wandar

comments.content:
"WE WANT" is Friz Quardra Bold. "ASSISTED HOUSING" could be  
Paradigm, "Vendom Group" is Helvetica.

I'm with Alexey and Patty, weights of Friz Quadrata and Univers but… wait a cotton picking minute. Can we stand idly by, and let these people **®** their [squooshed™](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021232343/http:/typophile.com/wiki/squooshed%E2%84%A2) monstrosity?

They haven't even had the decency to correct the kerning.

Richard
